attributes.action: make cycling on our roads safer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is much talk in the media about improving our health through exercise and being environmentally conscious, particularly in big cities. More people would cycle to and from work but are quite rightly concerned about safety on the roads. Please make cycle routes off busy roads easier to follow and introduce cycle lanes on the busier roads. Also, make cycling proficiency compulsory in schools, so that cyclists also respect other road users.
